1.0.name: wordpress/better-protected-pages
1.0.description: Better Protected Pages Plugin Compatible with wordpress 2.7 upwards Improve Wordpress password protected pages Enable/Disable the included CSS file from within the plugin No need to edit any core files Adds a RE-LOCK feature, so that you can lock a page when you are leaving Show the excerpt from your page/post (or not  setup in the admin area!) Graphics included, or make your own to match your theme Very flexible CSS so that you can easily tweak the layout to match your theme FREE to use (but you can donate if you want to)
